title: Capping Constraint
description: Offer Capping Constraint is a component in a Personalization Offer that defines the parameters for capping. Capping is the process of limiting how many times an offer can be proposed, for an individual profile as well as across all profiles.

xdm:globalCap.title: Global Cap
xdm:globalCap.description: Global cap is a constraint on how many times an offer can be proposed in totality.

xdm:profileCap.title: Profile Cap
xdm:profileCap.description: Profile cap is a constraint on how many times an offer can be proposed to a certain profile.
